listings.name: Taco Guild
listings.description: Known for its beautiful historic church building, its innovative internationally-inspired taco offerings and list of more than 200 agave spirits, Taco Guild is known for its food quality, wide range of local and global flavors and pushing tacos to their limits.

listings.name: Harumi Sushi
listings.description: Vibrant sushi house with a casual ambiance, Both chef and creator, above all else, an artisan of living and eating well, Harumi’s dishes are comprised of a breathing expression of Japanese tradition united in modernity.

listings.name: Curry Corner
listings.description: A wide selection of curry dishes & other family recipes star at this low-key Indian restaurant.

listings.name: Green Bowl
listings.description: Wholesome vegan meals with organic produce

listings.name: North Italia
listings.description: Contemporary takes on Italian classics star at this warehouse-chic trattoria with a lively bar.

listings.name: China Chili
listings.description: Casual eatery serving regional Chinese dishes & Asian cocktails in a traditionally decorated space.

listings.name: Café Amore
listings.description: Specialty coffee drinks and fresh pastries.

listings.name: Bobby Q's BBQ
listings.description: Formerly knowna as Bobby McGee's, Bobby-Q BBQ has been serving great steaks and great barbeque since 2005. Slow cooking over Almond and Mesquite wood paired with the perfect blend of spices results in succulent hand-pulled pork, smoky sausage links, fork-ender brisket and ribs that fall right off the bone.

listings.name: The Ice Cream Shack
listings.description: Homemade ice cream in a variety of flavors.
